locutie.beschrijving: A critique of New Age angelology contrasted with Biblical angelology, focusing on the 'otherness' of angels as divine presence and their role in pointing to Christ.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High. The preacher uses historical-critical and canonical approaches, referencing Hebrews, Judges, and the Joshua narrative to deconstruct cultural myths.

illocutie.beschrijving: Primarily asserting the nature of God's holiness and the reality of judgment, transitioning late into promising comfort through Christ.
voorbeelden: I’m beginning to think it’s time to call a halt.
The Biblical angel is at the furthest possible remove from the guardian angel lapel pins.
The message of St. Michael and All Angels is this...

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: To move the hearer from a trivialized view of the divine to a holy dread that is then comforted by the Gospel promise.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Implicit. The preacher relies on the 'breathtaking' power of the word but does not explicitly invoke the Spirit's work.

voorbeelden: Angels are not household pets.
The Bible has stern warnings against cults of angels.
God has a case against us.
Look at the various Biblical references.
Consider the pictures of angels.
Fear not.
I have always loved angels myself.
I suppose Noah’s Ark is chief among them.
I think that should give us goosebumps.
The future belongs to him, and we belong to him.
He is with us in the flame.
All the promises of God find their Yes in him.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Strong but late. The promises are grounded in the 'Yes' of Christ.

voorbeelden: Peace be unto thee; fear not: thou shalt not die.
To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever.
declaratieven.autoriteit: The preacher quotes the angel/God as the source of declaration rather than speaking 'in persona Christi'.

indicatoren: Extensive description of Time magazine and cultural trends.
Long historical explanation of Byzantine vs. Renaissance art.
Theological definitions of what angels 'are not'.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer is well-informed and intellectually persuaded but remains an observer for the majority of the text.

missende_elementen: Direct address of the promise to the specific congregation until the very end
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Delayed encounter; the 'event' only happens in the final three paragraphs.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: High theological quality, shifting from 3rd person 'God' to 2nd person 'you' and 'we'.
voorbeelden: The future belongs to him, and we belong to him.
He is with us in the flame.

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Direct address to the congregation's struggles and 'fiery furnaces'.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Describing angels, culture, and biblical history.

tijdloos_present.gebruik: Theological truths about God and angels.

actueel_present.gebruik: The 'Yes' of Christ for the hearer now.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Moves from Assertive (What angels are) to Declarative (God's 'No' to our categories) to Commissive (Christ's 'Yes').
voorbeelden: God has a case against us (Assertive) -> Fear not (Declarative) -> All promises find their Yes in him (Commissive).
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: Theologically sound but structurally weighted toward the assertive beginning.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: He has overcome the world... fear not.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon functions as a corrective teaching that culminates in a powerful evangelical promise of comfort.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Angels are not Barbie dolls with wings.
sterke_punten.effect: Clears the ground for a real encounter with the Holy.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The long section on Time magazine and art history.
zwakke_punten.probleem: Delays the 'event' of the sermon by focusing on cultural criticism.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: The sermon becomes an event in the final movement when the preacher addresses the 'fiery furnaces' of the congregation.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The power is found in the 'Toezegging' (Promise) at the end, though the preacher remains largely a reporter of the promise rather than its executor.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: God speaks through the 'No' and the 'Yes' of the Word.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: The preacher acts as an interpreter of the Divine 'No'.
tekstueel_bewijs: The message of St. Michael and All Angels is this...

pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: Implicitly left to the 'breathtaking' nature of the message.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: Yes, specifically in the final application of the 'Yes' of Christ.
sacramentstheologie.epifanisch_taalgebruik: Strong in the description of the 'terrible' angel.
tekstueel_bewijs: The irruption of the presence of God... upsets all our accustomed categories.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is heavy on 'is/are' (descriptive) and light on 'I promise/I declare' (performative).

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: The Lord protects his children from his judgment.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Tonight, the Lord protects you from His judgment.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Shifts from a general truth to a present event.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The promise is general until the very end.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Interweave the 'Fear not' earlier into the specific pains of the congregation.
voorbeeldzinnen: To you who are in the furnace: Christ is there.

adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Use more 'you' to bridge the gap between the biblical text and the pew.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The balance is actually good; the indicative is strong.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterful piece of theological deconstruction that successfully lands in the grace of Christ, though it takes a long constative route to get there.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SAT identifies the 'No' of the angel as a Declarative act that shatters categories, which a psychological model would merely see as 'information' or 'appeal'.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: The analysis focuses on the authority of the 'Yes' in Christ (Illocution) rather than just the cleverness of the 'Barbie doll' metaphor (Rhetoric).
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT reveals that the sermon's power is concentrated in the Commissive 'Yes' of the final paragraphs, diagnosing the first half as necessary but non-performative 'ground-clearing'.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: God has a case against us.
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: Creates the necessary 'dread' for the Gospel to function.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: All the promises of God find their Yes in him.
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: The theological climax of the sermon.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a classic example of 'teaching' that moves into 'proclamation' only at the very end.
